LEAD AND MENTOR YOUNG PEOPLE FIND OUT MORE
NCS with The Challenge is an exciting youth and community programme which combines outdoor activities, skill development and community volunteering. This is a fantastic opportunity for talented, enthusiastic and experienced people wishing to work with young people and make a difference within their communities.
We have paid positions available for all entry levels, from those wishing to gain further experience in a youth work setting, to experienced Project Managers, Teachers and Youth Workers.
Please feel free to forward this email to anyone who might be interested!
LEADER AND MENTOR ROLES
We have a number of diverse and challenging roles available on our seasonal programmes, from leadership and mentoring to skill-sharing and logistical roles.
Leadership Roles (Semi-residential) Lead 60 young people and 15 staff members through a complex and demanding programme. Be responsible for managing challenging behaviour.
Mentor Roles (Semi-residential) Facilitate, lead and pastorally care for your team, assisting in their personal development.
PRACTITIONER, SUPPORT WORKER AND LOGISTICAL ROLES
Practitioner Roles (Non-residential) Use your drama, media, enterprise, photography, music or sport expertise to deliver skill-building workshops, and help your team to use this skill to interact with their community.
Support Worker Roles (Semi-residential) Work closely with a young person with additional needs, ensuring that they participate to their full potential and helping them to intergrate with the rest of the team.
Logistics Officer Roles (Non-residential) Assist with the logistical management of different weeks of the programme, managing relationships with key partners and young people.
More information on our seasonal roles can be found on our website.
OUR SEASONAL PROGRAMMES
When can you work on NCS with The Challenge?
We run our seasonal youth programmes throughout the year. Find the best programme for you at www.ncsthechallenge.org/about-the-programme.
Spring: February to March
Summer: Late June to Early October
Autumn:Late October to Early December
